BrainTrackr is a dementia screening plat: BrainTrackr is a dementia screening platform designed for early detection and secure clinical assessment.
Final Step: Upload Your MRI Scan: Final Step: Upload Your MRI Scan
To complete your assessment, please uplo: To complete your assessment, please upload your MRI scan below. This will help our specialists provide a more accurate evaluation.
Start a free, clinically validated cogni: Start a free, clinically validated cognitive screening in under 10 minutes.
Take the Self-Administered Gerocognitive: Take the Self-Administered Gerocognitive Examination (SAGE) in a guided, one-question-per-screen format.
Securely drag-and-drop your scan for dir: Securely drag-and-drop your scan for direct clinical review. No login required.
Your GP or local diagnostic center recei: Your GP or local diagnostic center receives your results immediately.
Is GreyMatter accessible for older adult: Is GreyMatter accessible for older adults?
Yes. The app is designed with large butt: Yes. The app is designed with large buttons, keyboard navigation, screen reader support, and clean layouts for ease of use.
Do I need to register or create an accou: Do I need to register or create an account?
No. Patients or caregivers can submit da: No. Patients or caregivers can submit data without logging in. Only GPs or authorized professionals have access.
Yes. We ensure GDPR-compliant encrypted: Yes. We ensure GDPR-compliant encrypted transmission. Nothing is stored locally.
Please confirm that you consent to share: Please confirm that you consent to share your data with authorised medical professionals.
Cookie.Title: Cookie Consent
Cookie.Message: This website uses cookies to enhance your experience and provide essential functionality. By continuing to use our site, you consent to our use of cookies.
We use the following types of cookies:: We use the following types of cookies:
These are necessary for the website to f: These are necessary for the website to function properly and cannot be disabled.
These help us improve how our website wo: These help us improve how our website works by collecting anonymous information about which pages are visited most often.
These enable enhanced functionality such: These enable enhanced functionality such as remembering your preferences.
You can control and manage cookies in va: You can control and manage cookies in various ways. You can delete all cookies that are already on your device and you can set most browsers to prevent them from being placed. However, if you do this, you may have to manually adjust some preferences every time you visit a site, and some services and functionalities may not work.
In accordance with the General Data Prot: In accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), we process personal data lawfully, fairly, and in a transparent manner. We collect and process data only for specified, explicit, and legitimate purposes and only keep it for as long as necessary.
If you have any questions about our Priv: If you have any questions about our Privacy Policy or our treatment of your personal data, please contact our Data Protection Officer at privacy@braintrackr.com.
